message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great product for a price of $9,500. I believe this product will be highly beneficial for you, and this is a very competitive price.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking of a price around $7,500. Can you consider that?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $7,500 is too low, I'm willing to come down to $9,000. I believe this is a fair offer considering the value this product provides.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $9,000 is still a bit high for me. Can you consider a price of $8,200?
